reason: My Market Stall at Calle dei Mercanti Orafi faces a critical shortage of bread, hindering trade and contributing to the general hunger affecting my workforce. By constructing a bakery on Calle dei Forni, I can establish a direct and reliable supply of bread, ensuring food security for my enterprises and enhancing productivity. This strategic investment supports my existing commercial network and embodies 'Ex Ingenio Prosperitas' by turning a challenge into an opportunity for production.
